body:
How much a slice grows after an `append( )` depends on the size of the elements of the underling array. [Relevant](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/runtime/slice.go#L37). 

What's happening is that the playground `ints` have a different size than the `ints` on your system. Change `var a []int` to `var a []int64` in the tour code and you can see the difference: 

https://play.golang.org/p/788ngmEBp0
